articles.title: GM to significantly cut North American vehicle production due to chip shortage - CNBC
articles.description: General Motors said Thursday that it's adding or extending downtimes at eight plants in the U.S., Canada and Mexico.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Japan princess to wed, reject payout after controversy: Reports - New Straits Times Online
articles.description: TOKYO: The course of true love never did run smooth, but after public controversy and a wedding delay, Japan's Princess Mako is reportedly set to tie the knot and move to America.

articles.title: U.S. COVID vaccination rates climb in August - Medical Xpress
articles.description: (HealthDay)—Nearly 14 million Americans got their first dose of a coronavirus vaccine in August, a steep rise from July, White House officials said Tuesday.
